lesson_objectives:
• High level overview of Liquibase
  • Understand how Liquibase works on a fundamental level

• Find the liquibase website
  • Download the liquibase CLI tool
  • Setup Liquibase to apply changelogs

lesson_title: Apply a database change with Liquibase
lesson_objectives:
• Get to know the update action of the Liquibase CLI
  • First hand exposure to Liquibase CLI
  • First hand exposure to change logs

lesson_title: Apply a database change with Liquibase and Maven
lesson_objectives:
• Understand how to configure Liquibase iwth Maven.
  • Get to know some Liquibase Maven plugins that are available
  • Draw parallels between CLI and Maven
  • More experience running Liquibase update

lesson_title: Test a database change with Liquibase
lesson_objectives:
• Understand how to test changes.
  • Learn to troubleshoot changes.

lesson_title: Rollback a database change with Liquibase
lesson_objectives:
• Understand the use cases for rolling back changes.
  • See how to adapt your process to reverse changes.

• Learn to write documentation in change logs
  • Learn use Liquibase to generate HTML output of documentation.
  • Orientation on using documentation and understanding it.

• Migrate changes to the same database platform
  • Migrate changes to a different database platform.

lesson_title: Additional overhead for managing project changes
Coupling other changes with database changes
